name: Normal Human Adult Person
description:
How to play:

  • Move with arrow keys or A/D
  • Jump with space bar
  • Talk with "E"
  • Interact with "F"

Find your friends, fool the adults, and flee the school to see the latest action movie!

This was made in a week for Brackeys game jam with the theme "stronger together".

Creators:

  • Zach Knapp
  • James Wagner
  • Erik Boswell
  • Joe Knapp
  • Tom Boswell
  • Gabby Arroyo

Thanks for playing!
